alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 21 at 11:15AM MDT until April 22 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph through tonight. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and East Lake County Above 11000 Feet, and Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
